tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE crypto_holdings (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    account_id INT,
    currency VARCHAR(50),
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    last_updated TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    wallet_id INT,
    transaction_type VARCHAR,
    amount DECIMAL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Alerts (
    alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    account_id INT,
    alert_type VARCHAR,
    description TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
